header.name: CESAR PEREZ

summary.title: Professional Summary
summary.paragraph: Mid-Level Software Engineer and Cloud Solutions Architect with a strong background in designing and implementing scalable and secure architectures on Microsoft Azure. Expert in Full-Stack development (React, Next.js, Python/FastAPI), building systems with advanced enterprise authentication (Microsoft Entra ID), and API optimization. Pioneer in process automation and Artificial Intelligence application, using advanced tools for autonomous code creation, testing and correction, as well as copilot-based solutions. My self-taught approach and commitment to DevOps practices (GitFlow, CI/CD) allow me to transform complex challenges into efficient, robust solutions. I am driven by innovation and a constant search for strategic value through technology.

job1.point1: Technical leadership in the design and implementation of scalable, secure architectures on Microsoft Azure (Functions, Cosmos DB, Service Bus, serverless resources).

job2.point6: Application of unit testing, version management (Git), and continuous integration workflows to ensure deliverable quality.

job4.point2: Design, editing, and publishing of visual resources and communication manuals for social networks and internal use.

job5.point1: Management and operation of professional photography and video equipment for corporate content production and events.
job5.point2: Editing, post-production, and delivery of high-quality audiovisual material using Photoshop, Premiere, and After Effects.

proj1.name: Full-Stack Web Platform with Advanced Authentication and Analytics (Nakamototrading)
proj1.description: Comprehensive development of a responsive web platform with Next.js and internal API for key functions. Includes a secure registration/login system managed with Supabase Auth, user metrics tracking in Supabase Database, and a CDN for efficient content delivery.
proj1.achievement1: Building modern and scalable web applications.
proj1.achievement2: Implementation of secure authentication and robust user flows.

proj2.name: Evana - Intelligent Family Assistant (AI Agent System)
proj2.description: Design and implementation of a modular architecture for an intelligent agent system (Autogen) capable of supporting complex tasks. Includes a FastAPI backend for the API, Azure Functions as serverless external tools for agents, and an Angular frontend (in development). This system demonstrates advanced AI orchestration for task automation and intelligent support.
proj2.achievement1: Design of complex agent-based AI systems.
proj2.achievement2: Development of scalable and secure backend.
proj2.achievement3: Advanced integration of serverless services as tools for AI.
proj2.achievement4: Professional version control and environment management.
